snippet: Senate Democrats on Friday will ask the Internal Revenue Service to institute a "bright line test" to ensure tax exempt organizations devote less than half their activities to politics and to prevent corporate donors from deducting "super PAC"...
abstract: Senate Democrats on Friday will ask the Internal Revenue Service to institute a "bright line test" to ensure tax exempt organizations devote less than half their activities to politics and to prevent corporate donors from deducting "super PAC" contributions from their taxes.

headline.main: Senate Democrats Ask I.R.S. for More Scrutiny of  Nonprofit Political Groups
